abstract: Mylan shareholders approve hostile bid for Perrigo.
lead_paragraph: Mylan shareholders approved the company’s hostile pursuit of Perrigo, and the company hopes to push ahead with a formal offer soon.

headline.main: Mylan Gets Shareholders’ Blessing to Buy Perrigo
headline.print_headline: Mylan Gets Shareholders’ Blessing to Buy Perrigo

snippet: Mylan shareholders approved the company’s hostile pursuit of Perrigo, and the company hopes to push ahead with a formal offer soon.
